WorkItem.Description:
The mongoose enchant is listed as the lowest enchant available for my bear.  The part that looks odd though is that the survival number is negative.
I am using Rawr 2.3.4.

Comments.Message: I am having the same issue with the ProtWar model. All my enchants have negative values no matter which one I select, same Rawr version also.
I've seen this type of issue before, and I believe the last time it occurred Kavan had to correct it. It was some kind of threading desynchronization issue.

Well, something odd is definitely going on there. As stated in our bug reporting guidelines, we can't do anything about it without all of the required data. Please post your character file.

Mongoose may have some negative value, if you have Target Parry Hastes checked, since it provides haste, which makes the target parry more often, and so do more damage to you. However, that negative value should be miniscule, not that huge value you're seeing there.

my character file
It's happening with other enchants too.

I'm having this issue with Rawr Bear and Cat.  For example, the enchant +10 stats to chest shows a negative DPS value for cat, while +8 stats to chest has a much higher positive value.  Attaching file.
I am also attaching a Bear model version where the leg enchants for LW and non-LW (exact same stat values) show very different values as enchants.
